snippet: Claressa Shields, a 17-year-old middleweight, convincingly defeated Kazakhstan’s Marina Volnova and now stands as the United States’ last chance at a gold medal in boxing.
abstract: American middleweight boxer Claressa Shields convincingly defeats Kazakhstan’s Marina Volnova and now stands as the United States' last chance at a gold medal in boxing.
lead_paragraph: Claressa Shields, a 17-year-old middleweight, convincingly defeated Kazakhstan’s Marina Volnova and now stands as the United States’ last chance at a gold medal in boxing.

headline.seo: American Boxer Claressa Shields to Fight For Gold
headline.main: Respectful of History, U.S. Boxer Has a Shot to Make Some
headline.print_headline: Respectful of History, U.S. Boxer Has a Shot to Make Some
